text: Hagi kagrama maka zampima knare'ma hunka mani'nana knafi ko nagra koro kea kasami'noane. Hianagi kagra hunka, ana nanekea ontahigahue hunka hu'nane. E'inahu kema hanana ko'ma osi'ma mani'nantegati'ma hunka'ma e'nana naneke ana nanekege menina nehane. Ana nehunka nagri kea antahinka amagera nontane.
